description: TEHRAN – The commander of the Ground Force of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) announced in a Sunday gathering of military officials that Iran’s armed forces have identified multiple terrorist breeding centers in neighboring countries, where criminals are nurtured and rented out for terrorist purposes.
title: Terrorist breeding centers in neighboring countries identified: Iranian commander

description: TEHRAN – In a Monday meeting, the commander of the Iranian Army's Ground Force emphasized the significant shift in the force's capabilities, moving away from traditional weapons to advanced armaments with high combat readiness and defensive capabilities.
title: Army Ground Force equipped with advanced armaments: senior commander

description: TEHRAN - In an analysis, Donya-e-Eqtesad dealt with the prospect of cementing diplomatic relations between Iran and Saudi Arabia and said: There are two doctrines of thought in Saudi Arabia's political circles.
title: Imbalance in the prospect of two competitors

description: TEHRAN – Iran's acting President Mohammad Mokhber has urged Muslim nations to unite in an effort to halt the Israeli regime’s ongoing actions in the besieged Gaza Strip.
title: Iran calls for Muslim unity against Israeli actions in Gaza

description: TEHRAN – Leader of Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei addressed the esteemed Hajj pilgrims, highlighting the "human scope" and "spiritual strength of Islam" as integral facets of the pilgrimage duty.
title: Ayatollah Khamenei emphasizes ‘human scope’, ‘spiritual strength of Islam’ in Hajj message

description: TEHRAN – Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei, the Leader of Islamic Revolution, has approved to pardon or commute sentences for 2,654 prisoners.
title: Leader pardons, commutes sentences for 2,654 Iranian inmates

description: TEHRAN – Khamenei.ir, covering the Leader of the Islamic Revolution’s activities and thoughts, has urged people worldwide to join a campaign demanding the public rejection of the Zionist regime.
title: Leader’s media representative calls for global show of renunciation of Israel

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s acting President has lauded the late Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian’s political endeavors, during a meeting with Hamid Nouri, the Iranian national recently released from Swedish prison.
title: Iran acting President hails late Amir Abdollahian’s endeavors in meeting with Hamid Nouri

description: TEHRAN – Igor Khovayev, the Special Representative of the Russian Foreign Minister for the Settlement of Issues between Azerbaijan and Armenia, visited Tehran on Sunday to discuss the latest developments in the Caucasus region.
title: Iranian, Russian officials discuss Caucasus developments in Tehran meeting

description: Gaza’s Government Media Office has accused Israel and the US of “purposefully” worsening famine-like conditions in Gaza by “withholding humanitarian aid as a tool for political pressure”.
title: Gaza govt. decries Israel’s ‘use of starvation to achieve political goals'

description: The United States has long supported Israel: we have sent over $320 billion in financial aid to a country that has a higher per capita income than France and Germany; we have given Israel most of our lethal weapons; we have shared intelligence and supplied Israel with political support at the UN and at the UN Security Council with dozens of vetoes to shield Israel from its crimes and to protect it from increasing global recrimination and isolation; we have issued massive media support including through print, airwaves, internet and the entertainment industry in order to silence anti-Israeli voices.
title: American lawmakers are serving Israeli interests and not America's

description: TEHRAN - The decision made by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to dissolve his six-member war cabinet has highlighted growing rifts in Israel amid the regime’s failure to achieve its goals in the Gaza Strip.
title: Tsunami of resistance drowns Israel’s war cabinet

description: Writing an article on the Al Jazeera website, Fatima Payman, a Labor senator for Western Australia, suggests it is morally and ethically imperative that Canberra recognize Palestine as an independent state to promote peace.
title: Australia must recognize Palestine to promote peace: senator

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin is making a two-day official visit to North Korea.
title: Putin visiting N Korea

description: TEHRAN- Iranshahr Theater Complex in Tehran will host the play “Pockets Full of Bread” written by Matei Visniec from July 2 to August 14.
title: Iranshahr Theater Complex to host Matei Visniec’s “Pockets Full of Bread”

description: TEHRAN-The Cinema Museum in Tehran will hold a special ceremony on June 21 on the occasion of the 84th birth anniversary of the late Iranian filmmaker Abbas Kiarostami (June 22, 1940 - July 4, 2016).
title: Cinema Museum to celebrate Kiarostami’s birth anniversary

description: TEHRAN-The Iranian short animation “In the Shadow of the Cypress,” directed by Shirin Sohani and Hossein Molayemi won an award at the 23rd Tribeca Film Festival, held in New York, the U.S., from June 5 to 16.
title: Iranian Animation “In the Shadow of the Cypress” wins at Tribeca Film Festival

description: TEHRAN – As the presidential election draws closer, the political landscape in Iran is becoming more intense, with several candidates grabbing headlines this weekend.
title: Election atmosphere heats up

description: TEHRAN - Iran's Foreign Ministry has condemned a joint statement by the UK, France, and Germany concerning Iran's nuclear program, dismissing their allegations as "bogus and invalid."
title: Tehran condemns Western hypocrisy over anti-Iran E3 statement

description: TEHRAN- Funerals are being held for more than a dozen Israeli soldiers who have died since Saturday as a result of battles in the Gaza Strip.
title: Funerals held for 13 Israeli soldiers

description: The UN agency for Palestinian refugees (UNRWA) says Israel has killed nearly 200 of its workers since declaring war on Gaza on October 7.
title: Nearly 200 UNRWA workers killed by Israel

description: The conditions of the next peace proposal for Ukraine if the current one is rejected will be more complex and harsh, Russian Foreign Intelligence Service (SVR) Director Sergey Naryshkin told TASS.
title: Russia: Rejected peace proposal will bring tougher terms

description: The Greek coastguard has caused the deaths of dozens of migrants in the Mediterranean over a three-year period, witnesses said including nine who were deliberately thrown into the water.
title: BBC report: Greek coastguard threw migrants overboard to their deaths

description: Israel said it is looking to “strengthen” Jewish settlements in the occupied West Bank after several countries recognized a Palestinian state.
title: Israel threatens to expand West Bank settlements

description: TEHRAN – Iran lost to Japan in straight sets (25-17, 25-19, 25-17) in the 15th Asian Women’s U18 Volleyball Championship on Monday.
title: Iran fall to Japan at 2024 Asian Women’s U18 Volleyball Championship

description: TEHRAN – Iran have no chance of qualifying for the 2024 Olympic Games in Paris and just play for their pride in the 2024 Volleyball Nations League (VNL) Week 3.
title: Iran volleyball play for pride in 2024 VNL Week 3

description: TEHRAN – Shining bright, Isfahan province, situated in central Iran, has came out on top of the tourism marketing ranking nationwide throughout the past Persian calendar year (ended in March).
title: Isfahan comes out on top of national tourism marketing ranking

description: TEHRAN – An exhibition featuring Persian kilim carpets from 24 different provinces across Iran has opened at the Carpet Museum of Iran.
title: Tehran museum unveils kilim treasures from 24 provinces

description: TEHRAN - The ruins of Sheikh Makan castle, located six kilometers southeast of Darreh Shahr, Ilam, are slated to undergo restoration.
title: Sheikh Makan castle set for restoration

description: TEHRAN – Living an adventure from Tehran to the northern provinces, a tourism motorcycle rally has started as the first of its kind in Iran.
title: Motorcyclists embark on tourism journey in northern Iran

description: TEHRAN – Mohammadreza Riazi, a distinguished expert in the Iranian cultural heritage, has passed away due to cardiac arrest, at the age of 75.
title: Mohammadreza Riazi, veteran cultural heritage expert, dies at 75

description: TEHRAN - Alireza Askari Chaverdi, the director of the Persepolis and Naqsh-e Rustam historical sites, has reported a critical funding cut for Persepolis while emphasizing the necessity of treating the land subsidence crisis at Naqsh-e Rustam as an international project.
title: Urgent need for attention: land subsidence threatens Naqsh-e Rustam

description: TEHRAN –The efforts of the administration of the late President Ebrahim Raisi to address the predicament of sand and dust storms (SDSs), as one of the factors contributing to drought and desertification, led to the evolution of national discourse into regional, and subsequently international discourse, according to the head of Department of Environment (DOE).
title: Promoting intl. cooperation to combat SDSs

description: TEHRAN – Having been dried up for nearly 25 years, the Dargah Lotfollah wetland, located in Naqadeh county, northwestern West Azarbaijan province, is being revived, an official with the provincial department of environment has said.
title: Wetland being restored after 25 years

description: TEHRAN –The number of top Iranian universities and research institutes in the Essential Science Indicators (ESI) database has increased from 115 last year to 134 this year, ranking the country 14th worldwide, and second among Islamic countries, the Islamic World Science Citation Center (ISC) has reported.
title: Iran ranks 14th for most-cited institutes worldwide

description: TEHRAN - The secretary general of the Association of Home Appliances Manufacturers in Iran said the production of home appliances increased by 18.2 percent in the previous Iranian calendar year (ended on March 19) compared to a year before.
title: Annual production of home appliances in Iran rises 18%

description: TEHRAN - The Iranian Oil Ministry has signed four contracts worth $2 billion, including agreements to develop two oil fields.
title: Iran Oil Ministry signs contracts worth $2b with local firms

description: BEIJING- A number of journalists from different countries visited Drum Tower and Bell Tower of Beijing in a tour arranged by the China International Press Communication Center (CIPCC).
title: CIPPC provides opportunity for world journalists to visit Beijing Bell, Drum Towers

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s electricity consumption has registered a significant year-on-year growth, according to a report by Iran Grid Management Company (IGMC)
title: Daily power demand rises by 9GW: IGMC

description: BEIJING- A number of journalists from Asia and Africa participated in a basketball friendship match at “The Box”, a youth energy center in Beijing’s Chaoyang District.
title: Asian, African journalists participate in basketball friendship match at “The Box”

description: TEHRAN - The ambassador of Bangladesh to Iran has said Iran has no rival in the region, benefits from capable manpower, and has rich natural resources and Bangladesh wishes to expand economic ties with the Islamic Republic.
title: Bangladeshi envoy calls for expansion of trade with Iran

description: TEHRAN - Iran exported about five million tons of steel products in the first two months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21 to May 22, 2024), showing a 4.6 percent decrease compared to the same period last year.
title: Export of steel products reach 5m tons in 2 months

description: TEHRAN - Iran and Tajikistan have signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) to cooperate in in the field of geomatics.
title: Iran, Tajikistan sign MOU to expand cooperation in geomatic sciences

description: TEHRAN - Iran has purchased some 4.4 million tons of wheat at the worth of over $1.3 billion from domestic producers since April under the framework of a national plan that guarantees the purchase of domestic production of the crop.
title: Domestic wheat purchase at over $1.3b since April

description: TEHRAN – Iranian female archer Mobina Fallah clinched a quota place for Paris 2024 Olympic Games in Antalya, Turkey on Sunday.
title: Iran archer Fallah secures silver and 2024 Paris berth
